full_summary:
**Title:** Purchase of a Warehouse with Installation
**Valcartier Forest Site**

**Government Contract Opportunity:**

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites proposals from interested suppliers to supply, deliver, and install a prefabricated warehouse at the Saint-Gabriel-de-Valcartier forest site.

**Background:**

Natural Resources Canada has identified a requirement for a prefabricated warehouse at the Valcartier forest site. Interested suppliers are invited to submit a proposal to meet this requirement.

**Scope of Work:**

The selected supplier will be responsible for supplying a prefabricated warehouse, delivering it to the site, unloading, and installing it, as well as commissioning it. The supplier must also prepare the ground and pour a reinforced concrete slab on-site.

**Tendering Procedure:**

Interested suppliers must submit their proposals electronically using the Canada Post Corporation (CPC) Connect service. Bids in hard copy or transmitted by facsimile will not be accepted.

**Mandatory Requirements:**

* The supplier must provide a bid security with their proposal.
* The supplier must meet all mandatory requirements listed in the bid solicitation.

**Work Period:**

The supplier must complete the work within 14 weeks from the date of acceptance of the offer.

**Languages:**

This procurement is conducted in both official languages of Canada. Documents may be submitted in either language.

**Contact Information:**

For inquiries regarding this tender, please submit written requests to Isabelle Girard, Isabelle.Girard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Notice URL:**

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/07/8916eebdc0c0e15d3b743633d80b458b/rapport_geotechnique_-_geotechnical_report.zip

**Attachments:**

The following documents are attached to this notice:

* Geotechnical Report
* Bid Solicitation Document
* Proposal Requirements Document

**Trade Agreement:**

CFTA

**Procurement Method:**

Open Competitive Bidding

**Notice Type:**

Request for Proposal

**Procurement Category:**

Goods and Services

**Contracting Entity:**

Public Works and Government Services Canada

**Region:**

Quebec (except NCR)

**Closing Date:** November 18, 2022, 14:00 Eastern Time. This notice will cease to be available 6:00 AM on this date.

Note: Figures and data have been reduced
